name: Wagotabi
storyline: Embark on a transformative journey through real Japanese prefectures, immersing yourself in the culture, language, and daily life. Connect with locals, navigate new surroundings, and witness the surprises that unfold at every turn. Feel the sense of belonging as you make strides in understanding and interacting with Japan's rich environment. Your decision to fly to Japan was the right one!
summary:
Wagotabi is an educational journey that will teach you Japanese from the zero.It relies on a new methodology which prioritizes which Hiragana, Katakana or Kanji you should learn and will help you dive deeper in the language immersion from the very start.

Embark on this transformative journey through real Japanese prefectures, immersing yourself in the culture, language, and daily life. Connect with locals, navigate new surroundings, and witness the surprises that unfold at every turn. Feel the sense of belonging as you make strides in understanding and interacting with Japan's rich environment.
